sources.name: ADLdataset01
sources.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~>  ADLdataset01

typeProperties.script:
section Section1;
shared ADLdataset01 = let
  AdfDoc = AzureStorage.DataLakeContents("https://adltest08.dfs.core.windows.net/test01/sales.csv"),
  Csv = Csv.Document(AdfDoc, [Delimiter = ",", Encoding = TextEncoding.Utf8, QuoteStyle = QuoteStyle.Csv]),
  PromotedHeaders = Table.PromoteHeaders(Csv, [PromoteAllScalars = true])
in
  PromotedHeaders;
shared DataSource = let
  Source = ADLdataset01
in
  Source;
shared FactSales = let
  Source = DataSource,
  #"Choose columns" = Table.SelectColumns(Source, {"SalesTerritoryKey", "GeographyKey", "CustomerKey", "ProductKey", "CurrencyKey", "OrderDateKey", "DueDateKey", "ShipDateKey", "PromotionKey", "SalesOrderNumber", "SalesOrderLineNumber", "RevisionNumber", "OrderQuantity", "UnitPrice", "ExtendedAmount", "UnitPriceDiscountPct", "DiscountAmount", "ProductStandardCost", "TotalProductCost", "SalesAmount", "TaxAmt", "Freight"}),
  #"Changed column type" = Table.TransformColumnTypes(#"Choose columns", {{"SalesTerritoryKey", Int64.Type}, {"GeographyKey", Int64.Type}, {"CustomerKey", Int64.Type}, {"ProductKey", Int64.Type}, {"CurrencyKey", Int64.Type}, {"OrderDateKey", Int64.Type}, {"DueDateKey", Int64.Type}, {"ShipDateKey", Int64.Type}, {"PromotionKey", Int64.Type}, {"UnitPrice", Currency.Type}, {"OrderQuantity", Int64.Type}, {"ExtendedAmount", Currency.Type}, {"UnitPriceDiscountPct", type number}, {"DiscountAmount", Currency.Type}, {"ProductStandardCost", Currency.Type}, {"TotalProductCost", Currency.Type}, {"SalesAmount", Currency.Type}, {"TaxAmt", Currency.Type}, {"Freight", Currency.Type}})
in
  #"Changed column type";
shared DimProduct = let
  Source = DataSource,
  #"Choose columns" = Table.SelectColumns(Source, {"ProductKey", "ProductAlternateKey", "EnglishProductName", "StandardCost", "FinishedGoodsFlag", "Color", "SafetyStockLevel", "ReorderPoint", "ListPrice", "Size", "SizeRange", "Weight", "DaysToManufacture", "ProductLine", "DealerPrice", "Class", "Style", "ModelName", "EnglishProductSubcategoryName", "EnglishProductCategoryName"}),
  #"Changed column type" = Table.TransformColumnTypes(#"Choose columns", {{"ProductKey", Int64.Type}, {"StandardCost", Currency.Type}, {"SafetyStockLevel", Int64.Type}, {"ReorderPoint", Int64.Type}, {"ListPrice", Currency.Type}, {"Weight", type number}, {"DaysToManufacture", Int64.Type}, {"DealerPrice", Currency.Type}}),
  #"Renamed columns" = Table.RenameColumns(#"Changed column type", {{"ProductAlternateKey", "ProductCode"}, {"EnglishProductName", "ProductName"}, {"EnglishProductSubcategoryName", "ProductSubcategoryName"}, {"EnglishProductCategoryName", "ProductCategoryName"}})
in
  #"Renamed columns";
shared DimCustomer = let
  Source = DataSource,
  #"Choose columns" = Table.SelectColumns(Source, {"CustomerKey", "CustomerAlternateKey", "Title", "FirstName", "MiddleName", "LastName", "NameStyle", "BirthDate", "MaritalStatus", "Suffix", "Gender", "EmailAddress", "YearlyIncome", "TotalChildren", "NumberChildrenAtHome", "EnglishEducation", "EnglishOccupation", "HouseOwnerFlag", "NumberCarsOwned", "AddressLine1", "Phone", "DateFirstPurchase", "CommuteDistance", "City", "StateProvinceCode", "StateProvinceName", "CountryRegionCode", "EnglishCountryRegionName", "PostalCode"}),
  #"Merged columns" = Table.CombineColumns(#"Choose columns", {"FirstName", "MiddleName", "LastName"}, Combiner.CombineTextByDelimiter(" ", QuoteStyle.None), "FullName"),
  #"Changed column type" = Table.TransformColumnTypes(#"Merged columns", {{"CustomerKey", Int64.Type}, {"BirthDate", type date}, {"YearlyIncome", Currency.Type}, {"TotalChildren", Int64.Type}, {"NumberChildrenAtHome", Int64.Type}, {"HouseOwnerFlag", Int64.Type}, {"NumberCarsOwned", Int64.Type}}),
  #"Renamed columns" = Table.RenameColumns(#"Changed column type", {{"EnglishCountryRegionName", "CountryRegionName"}, {"EnglishOccupation", "Occupation"}, {"EnglishEducation", "Education"}, {"AddressLine1", "Address"}})
in
  #"Renamed columns";
shared DimSalesTerritory = let
  Source = DataSource,
  #"Choose columns" = Table.SelectColumns(Source, {"SalesTerritoryKey", "SalesTerritoryAlternateKey", "SalesTerritoryRegion", "SalesTerritoryCountry", "SalesTerritoryGroup"}),
  #"Changed column type" = Table.TransformColumnTypes(#"Choose columns", {{"SalesTerritoryKey", Int64.Type}})
in
  #"Changed column type";
shared DimCurrency = let
  Source = DataSource,
  #"Choose columns" = Table.SelectColumns(Source, {"CurrencyKey", "CurrencyAlternateKey", "CurrencyName"}),
  #"Changed column type" = Table.TransformColumnTypes(#"Choose columns", {{"CurrencyKey", Int64.Type}})
in
  #"Changed column type";
